channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubiquiti Networks -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubiquiti Networks -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-5426|2024-08-04T19:54:53.513Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgemax
item.description: In Ubiquiti Networks EdgeSwitch X v1.1.0 and prior, an unauthenticated user can use the "local port forwarding" and "dynamic port forwarding" (SOCKS proxy) functionalities. Remote attackers without credentials can exploit this bug to access local services or forward traffic through the device if SSH is enabled in the system settings.

item.title: CVE-2019-5424|2024-08-04T19:54:53.577Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgemax
item.description: In Ubiquiti Networks EdgeSwitch X v1.1.0 and prior, a privileged user can execute arbitrary shell commands over the SSH CLI interface. This allows to execute shell commands under the root user.

item.title: CVE-2019-5425|2024-08-04T19:54:53.473Z -- ubiquiti%20networks -- edgemax
item.description: In Ubiquiti Networks EdgeSwitch X v1.1.0 and prior, an authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands over the SSH interface bypassing the CLI interface, which allow them to escalate privileges to root.
